New Records: Michael Massey hit his 13th home run of the season in the 4th inning.
Juan Soto hit his 39th home run of the season in the 6th inning.
Jazz Chisholm Jr. reached base safely for the 66th time this season.
Salvador Perez reached base safely for the 100th time this season and drove in his 100th run of the season.
Luke Weaver earned his 5th win of the season.
Kris Bubic suffered his first loss of the season.
Key Match Events: The game went into extra innings after being tied 2-2 in the 9th inning.
The Royals scored the winning run in the 10th inning.
The Yankees scored the tying run in the 11th inning.
Jazz Chisholm Jr. scored the winning run for the Yankees in the 11th inning.
Luke Weaver earned the win for the Royals in the 11th inning.
Kris Bubic took the loss for the Royals in the 11th inning.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was played on September 11, 2024, at Yankee Stadium III.
